mapper.select: SELECT m.id, s.name AS studentName, d.name AS dormitoryName, m.reason, m.create_date AS createDate FROM moveout m, student s, dormitory d WHERE m.student_id = s.id AND m.dormitory_id = d.id;

SELECT m.id, s.name AS studentName, d.name AS dormitoryName, m.reason, m.create_date AS createDate FROM moveout m, student s, dormitory d WHERE m.student_id = s.id AND m.dormitory_id = d.id AND s.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%');
